CMultiXAppEvent Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for CMultiXAppEvent:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This is a base class for application generated events. If the application wishes to generate events, it can use this class or it can derive a class from it, create an instance and call CMultiXApp::QueueEvent() to queue the event. A pointer to this object will be provided when MultiX calls CMultiXApp::OnApplicationEvent().
